mapper.select: select categorymain, count(*) count from (select *, (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{lat})) * cos(radians(lat)) * cos(radians(lng) - radians(#{lng})) + sin(radians(#{lat})) * sin(radians(lat)))) as distance from store having distance <= #{distance}) a group by categorymain;

select storename, lng, lat, (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{lat})) * cos(radians(lat)) * cos(radians(lng) - radians(#{lng})) + sin(radians(#{lat})) * sin(radians(lat)))) as distance from store having distance <= #{distance}
